Detailed Description

Bot Implementation of the base bot AI. A bot is an AI that can have Goals.

Member Function Documentation

) [virtual]

Lets this object know when a registered aspects of interest has changed

Implements IObserver.

void Bot::PreUpdate ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called before each Update call to perform pre-processing. Initializes parameters for this frame and calls PreUpdate for this Bot's Goal.

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
AIObject::PreUpdate

Reimplemented from AIObject.

Reimplemented in Animal, Chicken, Horse, and Swallow.

void Bot::Update ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called each frame to update this Bot. This is where most of the work is done to update the Bot. This will update the Bot's Goal and do things like determine the new velocity.

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
AIObject::Update

Reimplemented from AIObject.

Reimplemented in Animal, Chicken, Horse, and Swallow.

void Bot::PostUpdate ( f32  DeltaTime  )  [virtual]

This method is called after each Update call to perform post-processing. Finilizes Bot updates for this frame (post changes to other systems). This will call PostUpdate for the Bot's Goal.

Parameters:
DeltaTime Elapsed time since the last frame.
See also:
AIObject::PostUpdate

Reimplemented from AIObject.

Reimplemented in Animal, Chicken, Horse, and Swallow.
